"Kuronite Suppression":
"We've received a message that
the Shironia area of planet Harkotan
is under attack by Kuronites and Darkers.
Confirmation and suppression is required.
Available ARKS are to sortie when ready,
and cooperate with Shironians when
possible, subduing Kuronites and Darkers.
――――――――――――――――――――
Clear: Collect [200] Quest Points
by defeating Kuronites."
